title: Xibai Po 2: Yingxiong Wang Er Xiao
synopsis: The story takes place in China in 1941. The whole country resisted the Japanese aggression stubbornly. In the heroic battle of the Hirayama regiment, the Japanese retreated steadily. As a result, the cunning Japanese invaders aimed at the hometown of the soldiers of the Pingshan regiment-Nangunlong Village. Wang Erxiao is an ordinary little boy who lives there, but he has the blood and the courage of the Chinese. The arrival of the enemy made him lose his home to survive, and he vowed to avenge his dead relatives. 　　 One day, Wang Erxiao met a wounded Japanese soldier in the village. The soldier captured Wang Erxiao and ordered Wang Erxiao to lead them to find the Eighth Route Army hiding in the village. Wang Erxiao was obedient on the surface, but actually took the Japanese around the village over and over again, while at the same time, his friend Zaohua secretly informed.(translated from douban)

title: Pure Shield
synopsis: 2 commercials featuring Sheryl Nome.

title: Niu Yuan
synopsis: Adapted based on Sima Guang•"Wrong Cow Question". 　　 The farmer drove the cattle to plow the hard yellow soil, and the ridge slowly stretched on the deserted plateau. 　　 At noon, the farmer rests under the sun, farming cows suckling his calves. The hard work made them fall asleep quickly. The evil tiger, who had been watching from a distance for a long time, jumped down the hill and pounced on the sleeping farmer. The alert ox stopped the evil tiger, and the evil tiger rushed towards the ox frantically. The bull and the tiger started a fierce fight. After several rounds of competition, the evil tiger failed to attack the farmer, grabbed the calf and ran away. The oxen chased them, and the evil tiger had to leave the calf to escape. The calf fell in a pool of blood, and the farming cow was in grief. At this time, the evil tiger saw an opportunity and rushed to the farmer again. The oxen immediately put aside the calf and tried to rescue the sleeping owner, and the battle between the ox and the tiger once again began life and death. The oxen struggled to death, and the evil tiger finally fainted to the ground. In order to prevent the evil tiger from harming the owner again, the farm cow guards the owner with his body. The evil tiger was dizzy and dizzy. Seeing this, he was embarrassed and afraid, and finally retreated. When the farmer woke up to see the oxen straddling him, his eyes were red, his mouth was covered with blood, and the calf fell in a pool of blood, he believed that the ox was a cruel devil and a bloodthirsty monster. The cow, the exhausted farm cow was speechless, was firmly tied to the dilapidated old tree, silently accepting the untrue accusation from the owner, and all the money was spent, and the bones were destroyed. The tearful cow was eventually stabbed to death by the owner.(translated from douban)

title: Fang Lian Yeye He Yuan Lian Nainai
synopsis: The square-faced grandpa and the round-faced grandma have their own prejudices, and gradually developed to the point of extreme absurdity. When they are deeply harmed by it, they understand a basic truth. The natural state has certain laws. It is absurd to change the original form of an object because of preference. The film gives people a kind of rational enlightenment.(translated from douban)

title: Yisheng Yu Huangdi
synopsis: The content tells that in ancient times, an emperor had a sarcoma on his head and called a civilian doctor and two imperial doctors to see him. Who can cure the emperor's disease will be rewarded. After the three doctors examined, one civilian doctor advocated the use of acupuncture and moxibustion for treatment, one imperial doctor believed that taking some tonics would cure him, and another imperial doctor said that it was not a disease at all. The sarcoma is the symbol of Dragon Ball and Shenlong. The emperor believed that the two imperial doctors were right, he rewarded the two imperial doctors and coaxed the civilian doctors out. The emperor took many tonics such as ginseng and deer antler, and after a few days the sarcoma grew bigger and bigger and hugged his head. The emperor hurriedly called the three doctors again for treatment. One imperial doctor didn't know it was good. Another imperial doctor thought it was not a disease. The emperor went down to the earth and the sarcoma on his head became larger, just like the old forehead is a symbol of good luck and longevity. The people's medical advice is that this is an aggravation of the disease, and surgery must be performed to remove the tumor in order to save life. When the emperor heard furiously that the civilian doctor was an assassin, he could not help but argue that the civilian doctor was pushed out and killed, and he rewarded the two doctors again. Within a few days, the emperor fell ill and died.(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1990.The animated cartoon "Doctor and the Emperor" won the national first "Hua Biao Award" Best Art Film Award. This is also the first time that Changchun Film Studio has won the National Award for Fine Arts.

title: Huihe
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Qiao Xia Shi Lu
synopsis: Describes that Zhang Liang, a young man in ancient times, respects the elderly, is full of "forbearance" and the spirit of abiding by the letter.(translated from douban)

details.Synonyms: Pick up shoes under the bridge

title: Huli Fen Bing
synopsis: Winter is here, and in the snow-covered valley, a hungry little fox takes one step at a time. He has been hungry for many days and hopes to find something to eat soon. At this moment, a wooden house appeared in front of the little fox. That is the home of the mother bear and the two baby bears. At this moment, their mother was making delicious pancakes for them, and the two little guys drooled. Finally, the mother's pancakes were prepared, and the big bear and the little bear carried the pancakes to eat outside, but they quarreled over the issue of dividing the pancakes. At this time, the little fox appeared in front of the baby bears. He pretended to help them divide the pie, but deliberately broke the pie between one big and one small. The little bears were naturally unwilling, and the little fox took advantage of the opportunity to bite off some of the bigger half. Since the bites were more and different in size from the other half, he turned his head and bit the other half. In the end, all the delicious pancakes entered the fox's belly...(translated from douban)

title: Shei Pa Shei
synopsis: It's a pleasant scene of leisurely caressing and carefreeness, full of enthusiasm, no one on the wild, poetic and picturesque can be described as a fairyland on earth. How comfortable is the northern geese flying south. By the pond, the crane bird wandered freely and feasted, but suddenly it panicked and flew away wailing. It turned out that it saw a venomous snake approaching nearby, so it didn't care about the hatching egg and hurried away. The poisonous snake greedily approached the egg, but turned around and locked on a small red fox nearby. The fox ran away in a hurry, and the viper chased him. It panicked and was forced into death, while it was sitting and waiting to die. A yellow mongoose appeared. Obviously it is the natural enemy of the poisonous snake, so it attacked like the poisonous snake that was still flaring its teeth and claws just now. After finally repelling the annoying fellow, the fox suddenly arrogantly launched an attack on the mongoose. 　　 These three guys chase me, the praying mantis catches the cicada and the oriole is behind. I don’t know who is whose natural enemy, who is afraid of whom...(translated from douban)

title: Mo Feng
synopsis: An explorer found the ruins of an ancient battlefield in the Great Desert. At night, a sudden gust of wind blows, and the skeleton buried in the hill is drawn into the sky. These skeletons that had been killed for thousands of years suddenly came alive in the air, fighting each other and starting a battle. The wind and sand passed, and the desert returned to calm. The explorer looked back, and an oasis appeared in the ancient battlefield.(translated from douban)

title: Mao Yu Shu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: 12 Zhi Wenzi He 5 Geren
synopsis: Midsummer is coming, mosquitoes and flies are rampant. Somewhere, in the air not far from the ground, 12 mosquitoes lined up neatly, waiting for the appearance of their prey. Soon, a tall man appeared. When caught off guard, the mosquito army whizzed down and besieged the man. He was attacked from head to toe all over his body. The man thought for a while, and felt that it was too bad for a person to be bitten. He counted the number of mosquitoes and instantly came up with a good way. The man brought in a solid man again, and the mosquito army attacked again. The difference was that each person was only attacked by 6 mosquitoes. The tall man was delighted for a while, but the honest man tried to reduce the loss, so he found another victim. In the third, until the fifth man appeared, the absolute average balance was completely broken...(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1992.The film won the Science and Education Award of the Second Shanghai Film Festival.

title: Shei Shi Guanjun
synopsis: In order to compete for the gold medal in the annual "Café de Coral Show Contest". Dolls, bears and others rushed to the stadium in a small plane and red car. The road was thrilling and intense, and it was very interesting. At the meeting, they performed "doll and bear dancing", "a bird", "jingle bells" and other exciting programs. Finally, who is the champion of the exhibition match? The host of the show invites the children to rate it.(translated from douban)

title: Guai Laotou Er
synopsis: ep1:Zhao Xinxin, a fifth-grade student in a certain elementary school, is a fan of martial arts. He likes to show two brushes, but he doesn't like to pay attention to hygiene. One day, he had a stomachache from eating dirty things. While standing on the bus holding his stomach home, Zhao Xinxin did good deeds and paid for a seat for an old man who was coughing, so he met this old man who called himself a strange old man and had a few conversations. Zhao Xinxin felt strange. The magic of the old man. Afterwards, the old man took Zhao Xinxin to his home, and after a performance, Zhao Xinxin was stunned. Suddenly, the old man asked Zhao Xinxin to swallow two small birds in order to eliminate the worm in his stomach. Zhao Xinxin was scared to death.(translated from douban)

title: Cixi Zuo Huoche
synopsis: It is adapted from folklore. At the end of the Qing Dynasty, the first railway appeared in our country. After hearing the news, Cixi immediately decided to take a train to inspect various places, so everyone decorated the train according to the rules of the Chinese dynasty. But on the train, Cixi dreamed of a mutiny in the capital, so he hurried back to the court. After returning to Beijing, Cixi felt that the train was not auspicious and was not as comfortable as a sedan chair, so she ordered the train to be driven as far as possible from the capital. The film shows the incompetence of the late Qing government through Cixi's attitude towards trains.(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1991.The film won the second prize of the second National Film and Television Animation Exhibition.

title: Kaidian
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Viola wa Utau
synopsis: Music video for the song Viola wa Utau by Noriyuki Makihara that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Kouichirou Uchida with assistance from Super Brain.

title: San Zhi Xiao Huli Zhai Putao
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Obenkyoushitoiteyo
synopsis: Music video directed by Koudai Watanabe for the band Zutto Mayonaka de Iinoni. (ZUTOMAYO)

title: Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba(1995)
synopsis: "Big Head Son and Little Head Dad" is an excellent domestic fairy tale series composed of many interesting stories. There are a total of three films with a total of 156 episodes. The protagonist is a lively, cute and somewhat mischievous big-headed son, a patient, gentle and kind-hearted little-headed father, and a beautiful and intelligent apron mother. This is a family of three with Chinese characteristics. The father is the outside and the mother is the inside. Each episode of the story is drawn from the little things in life, and the original unpretentious real life has become full of childishness and fantasy with humorous narrative techniques.(translated from douban)

details.Synonyms: Big Head Son and Little Head Dad

title: The big head son and little head father (2002)
synopsis: The second season of "The big head son and little head father".

title: New Big Head Son and Little Head Dad Season 1
synopsis: "New Big Head Son and Little Head Dad" has a brand new improvement over the old version in terms of art design, plot control, visual effects, language rhythm, etc., and invited famous CCTV hosts Dong Hao, Ju Ping, and Liu Chunyan to join the dubbing. Sister Moon sang the theme song. In terms of theme interpretation, the new version not only continues the old version of the concept of family affection and father-son relationship, but also further strengthens the concept of "green, healthy and relaxed cartoons" and "companion-oriented common growth", and conveys it to the society and families Strong positive energy of loving life and family harmony.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸 第一季

title: New Big Head Son and Little Head Dad Season 2
synopsis: The second season of "New Big Head Son and Little Head Dad".

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸 第二季

synopsis: The season of "New Big Head Son and Little Head Dad Season 3".

title: New Big Head Son and Little Head Dad Season 6

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸第六季

title: New Big-headed Son and Little-headed Dad 3: Russian Adventures
synopsis: The little father took his family on a business trip to Russia. The older son discovered that the White Night City he painted in Russia was real. The family encountered a traffic accident halfway and was forced to stay overnight in a small hotel. The next day they woke up and found that they were in the older son. The world in the painting-White Night City. They found that if the crisis in White Night City was not resolved, they would not be able to get out of this world. The family went through many difficulties in White Night City and finally returned to the real world.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸3：俄罗斯奇遇记

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba 2 Yi Ri Chengcai
synopsis: Although the big-headed son (voiced by Liu Chunyan) is smart and sensible, he is only a child, unable to restrain the urge to play in his heart, delaying his studies, and the apron mother (voiced by Ju Ping) who sees all this is very anxious and does not know what to do Is good. One day, Dad Xiaotou (voiced by Dong Hao) accidentally met a mysterious figure named Dr. Wang (voiced by Lin Yongjian). Dr. Wang initiated an action called "A Day to Become Talent", claiming to be able to To create genius within a period of time The mother of the apron who hopes to have a son to become a dragon decided to send the big-headed son to Dr. Wang for "reconstruction", and she was very satisfied with the result of the matter. However, as time went on, the big-headed son began to slowly surface various drawbacks, and at the same time , Dr. Wang's conspiracy has gradually surfaced.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸2一日成才

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Zhi Mimi Jihua
synopsis: In the bustling corner of the city, there is an ordinary family of three. Big-headed son (voiced by Liu Chunyan), small-headed father (voiced by Dong Hao), and apron mother (voiced by Ju Ping). The big-headed son is innocent, naughty and cute. When he is in kindergarten, he always wants to fly into the sky like an astronaut and travel the universe. However, his dream was not understood by his parents. Dad was perfunctory and asked him to go to space to fight monsters. Mom wondered why he wanted to run so far, and if he didn't like the food his mother cooked. The eldest son secretly made a secret plan to become an excellent astronaut. Of course mom and dad also have their own secrets. The little-headed father who is an engineer is raising money with netizens to build a bridge for children in the mountains. The apron mother seems to be busy with housework, but she also has the so-called "Rainbow Project." 　　A family who loves each other and work together towards the dream in their hearts...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸之秘密计划

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Zhi Fu Shu Song Ji
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸之福鼠送吉

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Zhi Ma Nian Xin Yuan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸之马年新愿

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Chuxi·Baiye Cheng
synopsis: "New Year's Eve, White Night City, Big-headed Son and Little-headed Dad" takes "happiness" as the starting point, displaying exquisite White Night City animation scenes, cute and rich images of magical animals, creating a New Year's New Year's atmosphere, and entering the real world by mistake by a magical animal Interesting stories, to convey happiness to the audience regardless of age, with a childlike innocence, you can find the true meaning of life that is truly happy.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸 除夕·白夜城

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Zhi Nian De Weidao
synopsis: "The Taste of the Year" runs through the film with two famous animated stars, the big-headed son and Marshmallow. Through humorous food commentary, it talks about the topic of eating in the New Year and leads the children from the perspective of children. Experience the culture on the tip of Chinese cuisine.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸之年的味道

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Zhi Chao Neng Baba
synopsis: On the eve of the Spring Festival of the Year of the Monkey, the little-headed father was busy at work and neglected to care for the big-headed son. Another mistake caused the big-headed son to lose his beloved gift. The father and son are separated because of this, the little-headed father thinks hard and decides to play the son's beloved robot, and reconcile the father-son relationship. Under the outer shell of the robot, the little-headed dad seemed to inspire his own super energy and did some things he hadn't done in the past. He became the hero of the children. With the two people constantly running in, the big-headed son became more and more attached to the "robot", and the big-headed son also experienced the care of his little-headed father because of the robot. 　　 An accident caused the big-headed son to stumble upon a design draft drawn by the small-headed father a long time ago. This is the hard work of the little head father, but because of the birth of the big head, he missed the design competition. The big-headed son and the robot helped the little-headed father fulfill his dream and won the design award. The robot showed its true colors, and the estrangement between father and son disappeared. The New Year of the Monkey is here. Amidst the sound of festive firecrackers, the big-headed son and the small-headed father laughed and sang together, enjoying the happiest moment in the year.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸之超能爸爸

title: Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Zhi Caoyuan Qiyu
synopsis: In order to exercise the big-headed son's "labor practice" ability, the little-headed father decided to take the big-headed son to the mountain village for the New Year! The mountain village is full of New Year's taste, but for a New Year's Eve dinner, it takes a lot of effort, picking eggs, blowing fire stoves... These labors that have never been in contact with cities have added a lot of trouble to the big-headed son. Will his joyful journey be smooth sailing? Can he adapt to the natural life there? Can he learn to deal with animals? How will he break away from the weak image of the "little city prince" and get rid of the bad habits of spoiled and spoiled children in the city.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 大头儿子和小头爸爸之草原奇遇

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Zhi Menghuan Leyuan Qiyu Ji
synopsis: The big-headed son and Marshmallow's two childhood sweethearts came to Dreamland by accident, but because of the loss of a small screw, the garden lacked the joy and color of the past. Under such circumstances, the eldest son and Marshmallow took on the heavy task of finding the screw, and finally found the screw after numerous hurdles. At the same time that Little Screw returned to his post, Dreamland was restored as before, and the New Year's Eve to the Year of the Rooster smoothly.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 新大头儿子和小头爸爸之梦幻乐园奇遇记

title: Xin Datou Er Zi He Xiao Tou Baba Chuanqi Doudou
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Qi Qi Piao Youji

title: Xiao Zhu Heng Heng
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
background: This anime aired in 1996.This anime won Excellent Cartoon Award which in the Golden Boy Award .

title: Kaixin Jie
synopsis: The boy's name is Bobo, and the dog is Amugou. Once the little boy won a lottery while buying a drink, so he got a gift, that is Amugou.(translated from douban)

title: Xiongmao Jing Jing
synopsis: The little panda Jingjing was originally a carefree little panda. Surrounded by my dear panda father and panda mother. The family lives in the panda paradise, and their life is so good. But the good times did not last long. The energy hidden in the panda Jingjing was coveted by the scientific madman Dr. Mania. In order to obtain this power of Jingjing, Dr. Mania sent his men to burn the bamboo forest, destroy the panda park, and force the panda Jingjing. Out, trying to catch him. However, Jingjing got help from the wild boar Beibei and other partners, and escaped the clutches of Dr. Mania. After consulting with Professor Turtle, Jingjing embarked on a journey to find a new panda paradise. 　　 There are countless difficulties ahead of the road waiting for him, but Jingjing and his good friends have overcome them one by one, and have traveled all over the world. In the end, has Jingjing found a new panda paradise?(translated from douban)

title: Congming De Ben Xiao Zhu
synopsis: Audiences who have watched "The Lonely Pig" must still remember the little pig who started to be selfish and then reformed and lived happily with the little animal friends. This time, Little Pig becomes the protagonist of the series of animations. He is a kind pig, but his cleverness often backfires and makes all kinds of jokes. This film is a fine work of paper-cut animation. The lively paper-cut characters vividly show the characteristics of various small animals. At the same time, the anthropomorphic character is very dramatic. The whole animation is relaxed and interesting, which is the favorite of children.(translated from douban)

title: Fanqie Jiang
synopsis: Kathy Café is a place where novel stories often happen, and sometimes things will be messed up by Bestow, but the cats will use their wisdom to help him out of trouble and make things right. Some distinguished guests love the unique atmosphere and delicious cuisine of Kathy Cafe, and they have become regulars here. (translated from douban)

title: Hahajing Hua Yuan
synopsis: In the heyday of the Tang Dynasty, the heroine Wu Zetian wiped out dissidents and took control of the world, creating an unprecedented atmosphere for the lofty universe. There was a talent from time to time, named Tang Ao. Although he was a talented person, he was admitted to Tanhua, but because of his ties to the rebels Xu Jingye, Luo Binwang and others, he was given fame. Since then, the official path has been bleak and life is worrying. At the time of desperation, Tang Ao went to sea with his elder brother Lin Zhiyang and traveled to various countries in Southeast Asia. Along the way, they have experienced various strange countries and local customs, such as the legendary Jingwei Bird, who will give the benefits to others in everything, the two-faced country with two faces, as well as the Wing Republic, the ghost country, and the different tongue country. , Lilliputian and other weird countries. There is no way of talking nonsense, weird power, and everything in the world is probably like this... 　　 This film is adapted from the classic Chinese classic "Jing Hua Yuan" (by Li Ruzhen, Qing Dynasty).(translated from douban)

title: Taiyang Zhizi
synopsis: Weili Boy is the crystallization of the essence of the sun. The sun allows him to come to the world and use his super power to contribute to the high civilization of mankind. But when he was born, he was persecuted by the demons of the Black Kingdom-Heifengpo and the octopus. Because the Scorpio spirit wanted to destroy the Sun family and let its black group rule the universe, so it hated the appearance of the boy. As the mighty boy possessed tremendous energy, he defeated Black Wind Po and Octopus one after another, and destroyed their stronghold-Batu Caves and Undersea Demon Palace. When he pursued victory and attacked the black castle deep in the universe, he was resisted by Princess Scorpio. The lightning strikes in her palm have special magical powers, which caused the boy to fail repeatedly. Later, I learned from Grandpa Haiceng that Princess Scorpio was not the daughter of Scorpio, but the sister of Tong Ziyi, the sibling sister of the bead. So the boy and the others tried their best to tell Princess Scorpio the truth, who knew that Scorpio had already replaced all her genes, which made her obsessed. The boy and the others have finally recovered the princess's genes and restored her humanity through all kinds of dangers, and the sisters recognize each other. So everyone worked together to defeat the Scorpio spirit, destroy the Black Kingdom, and let the sun benefit mankind.(translated from douban)

title: Gulu Xiansheng
synopsis: Two cute little fairies, one is called Gulu, the other is called Ji Li. They often worry about their stomachs, and they try their best to find food. As a result, a lot of funny things happened and all kinds of jokes were made. This series is a comic cartoon of popular science, in which a lot of scientific knowledge is interspersed to guide children happily into the palace of science from the perspective of entertainment.(translated from douban)

title: Zhishi Laoren
synopsis: The story is about a old man teaching many knowledge to kids.

title: Xiao Shenxian He Xiao Xiannu
synopsis: The story takes place in a peaceful and sunny village of gods. Qiqi (voiced by Liu Yi) and Meimei (voiced by Hao Linjie) are two little gods living in the village. Qiqi has a lively and cheerful personality, and he is full of curiosity about everything. What Qiqi fears most is boredom. Therefore, he always tries his best to find all kinds of weird things to pass the time, which naturally provokes a lot of things during this period. The troubles caused a lot of jokes. 　　 Meimei likes fantasy. In order to experience a different life, she turned into a singer and a model for a while. Her hobbies and interests are even more bizarre and often new. The village elder deity loves the two smart little deities Qiqi and Meimei very much. He told them that it is only possible to accomplish great things if they have one heart and one mind and work together. The daily life full of happiness and joy in Shenxian Village continues.(translated from douban)

title: Zhonghua Chuanshuo Meide Gushi
synopsis: "Traditional Chinese Virtue Story" is a series of cartoons that reflect the noble moral sentiments of some famous figures in different eras in our history. Each episode tells a character, some of the characters in the story are witty, some are studious, some are brave, some are honest, and some have made great contributions to human science, allowing the audience to watch and feel that life should have The quality of truth, goodness and beauty inspires and perfects his personality. 　　 Each story in this series is derived from the stories and legends of real characters in history, so it lacks some joking elements and is not very humorous. Therefore, the characters and background are basically realistic styles, adding some realism and credibility. Because of the different historical eras, the different identities and personalities of the characters, the different plots and environments, the overall style of the series is unified, and the shapes and scenes of each sub-set have their own characteristics.(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Hutu Shen
synopsis: Suddenly an uninvited guest named Xiao Fushen came to the home of elementary student Xiao Bao. Little Stupid God is three and a half years old this year. His head is often convulsive. He has lost his way more than 800 times. He lives in Xiaobao's pen sharpener, and often doesn't even remember his name. As long as he chanted the "golden muddle-silver muddlehead" spell, his father and grandfather would come out to rescue him, but his father and grandpa were often more confused than the little foolish gods. In an accident, Little Stupid God let go of the big opponent in the gourd, and the lives of Little Treasure and Little Stupid God have been troubled ever since.(translated from douban)

title: Shen Nao Cong Zi
synopsis: Episode 1 Interstellar Clash Congzi’s parents’ spacecraft "Shenzhou Nine" was suddenly attacked by the Big Devil in space. The laser code just developed by Congzi bounced back the Big Devil’s ice bomb, and the "big mosquito" was sealed in the ice. Congzai and his parents fled the spaceship, and the spaceship exploded. Congzi’s parents were rescued 100 years ago. In this era, "Shenzhou One" was searching for information on the collision between Huimu and Huimu in space. They found Congzi and rescued him into "Shenzhou One". . 　　 Episode 2 Space Battle 　　 The big ice block was ejected and exploded. The "Big Mosquito" returned and launched an attack on the "Shenzhou One". "Shenzhou One" fought back, but the country is the Great Demon from the future, and its combat power is far stronger than "Shenzhou One". Just when the "Shenzhou One" was facing a disaster, Congzai released the energy of love and used the big devil's heavy shells. Back and destroy the "big mosquito". The big devil had no choice but to build another lunar base on the back of the moon. 　　 Episode 3 Protecting Antarctica 　　 The big devil is unwilling to fail, and he has a plan to make a dick to contend with Congzi, and sneak into the Antarctic, in order to make the dick more cold, evil, and extract the raw material for cold blood. The doctor sent a youth team to follow up and reconnaissance. Congzi and others found that the Antarctic iceberg was melting rapidly, endangering the earth, and hurriedly used the laser code to take emergency measures. After a battle of wisdom and bravery, Antarctica was finally protected. 　　 Episode 4 Dinosaur World 　　 In order to let Dianzi have a fierce body, the big devil sent him to the age of dinosaurs to kill 10,000 dinosaurs to obtain dinosaur genes. In the doctor’s laboratory, Xiao Liang and soybean sprouts accidentally activated the time machine invented by the doctor. They also came to the age of dinosaurs. They used laser emperor codes to rescue many killed dinosaurs, and the resurrected dinosaurs sought revenge on the dinosaurs. Congzi shouted "Love Appears" and rescued Dianzi. 　　 Episode 5 Destroy the Invisible Island 　　 The Earthlings held a commendation meeting and awarded the honorable title of "Young Dragon Knight" for the young team to protect the Antarctic. In order to realize the dream of dominating the earth, the devil sent Dianzi to sneak into the venue, and used the nerve particle gun to catch Congzi to their other base on the earth-the invisible island. The young dragon knight arrived in time to rescue Congzi and destroy the invisible island. 　　 Episode 6 The Elephant Mama Family 　　 Dianzi used nerve particle rays to provoke the elephant in the city back to Africa. The elephant rushed to the street and the city was in chaos. The young dragon knight escorted the elephant back to Africa, and the chap who followed him instigated the gorilla to set fire, causing a forest fire. Congzai activated the laser to rain heavy rain, the fire was extinguished and the elephant's home was kept. 　　 Episode 7 Bionic War Dr. 　　 used bionics and invented the bionic robotic bat for the benefit of mankind. Dianzi stole this technology and wanted to use the robotic bat to conquer the world, but he was afraid that the doctor and Congzi would destroy his plan, so he captured the doctor and laid an ambush under Bat Island, waiting for Congzi to throw himself into the net. Sure enough, Congzai came to rescue the doctor, but did not ambush him. Instead, he used the doctor's bionic technology to destroy the Bat Island and rescued the doctor. 　　 Episode 8 Desperate Racing 　　 Dianzi failed many times, and the big devil became very annoyed, and used the method to stimulate him to go to Congzi desperately. Dianzi will fight with Congzi, and Congzi's choice of duel is racing. The big devil sent the second and third demon kings to help Dianzi, but almost killed Dianzi. At the moment of crisis, Congzi activated the laser code to save Dianzi again. 　　 Episode 9 Satoshi Go Home Congzai’s parents have been using the time machine to find Congzai. On this day, there was a common phenomenon. Soybean sprouts and Xiaoliang pressed the time machine that the doctor was debugging. The time tunnel connecting the two places was connected. To my parents. In order to protect the earth, Congzi bid farewell to his parents. Before leaving, his parents told him that the laser code also has the function of filtering people's thoughts... 　　 Episode 10 Skateboard Conspiracy 　　 The big devil tried to threaten the people of the earth with a red giant meteor. In order to clear the obstacles, he sent Dianzi to steal Congzi to save a child. He desperately stepped on a skateboard and rushed forward, and Dianzi snatched the laser code. 　　 Episode 11 Return to the original owner 　　 Dianzi returned to the moon base and imitated Congzi's trial of the laser royal code. In the cry of "Showing love", the demon kings were in distress. Strangely, Dianzi was safe. In order to regain the laser emperor code, the dragon knights came to the moon. After Dianzi found out, he did not stop him. He asked Congzi to solve his doubts. 　　 Episode 12 Crush the Red Giant Fall The devil’s red giant meteor threatened the earth again, so the young dragon knight infiltrated the demon king’s moon base again. Who knows that the demon king was prepared, and the red giant fell on the earth...Congzi ordered the rat and dog to become a giant The net used the moon as a fulcrum, and used the principle of friction to project the red giant meteor to the depths of the universe. The earth was spared a disaster. 　　 Episode 13 Highland Fireworks 　　 The Great Demon King was frantic and caught children from all over the world on the roof of the world, surrounded him with heavy firepower as hostages, and forced Congzi to surrender his laser code. Congzi was indecisive, the laser emperor code was shattered by the big devil's shell and flew into the air. Suddenly, the fragments of the laser emperor code turned into countless small laser emperor codes and fell on the children's hands. The children sang the song "The Appearance of Love". In the loud singing, the three demon kings screamed in pain and were pushed into the depths of the universe. The aura of love enveloped the whole world...   and many more……(translated from douban)

title: Wan Wan Qian Qian Weisheme
synopsis: TV Popular Science Animation Series-Why Thousand Thousand Thousands of Educational Programs help children better understand the world and learn knowledge.(translated from douban)

title: Xuewen Mao Jiao Hanzi
synopsis: Two little tigers came from deep in the mountains and became students of learning cats. The hungry cats first learned how to hunt prey. Learning cats decided to take physical education in the first lesson. I learned the lesson from the little tiger, but after learning it, he wanted to eat the teacher. When they attacked the teacher, the learning cat easily climbed onto the tree, but the little tiger hadn’t learned how to climb a tree. Shuxia looked at the teacher at a loss, and knew that his skills were far from that of the teacher, so he determined to study hard from the teacher. Xuexue Mao believed that word recognition should be the beginning of learning, so he began to teach two small children. Tiger recognizes Chinese characters, of course.(translated from douban)

title: Xuewen Mao Shuo Lishi
synopsis: Starting from Chinese and foreign genesis myths and legends, through the Three Emperors, Five Emperors, Xia, Shang, (Western) Zhou, Spring and Autumn, and the end of the Warring States period, three thousand years of history are condensed in a 572-minute cartoon, enabling the audience to carry out events from the same historical era in China and foreign countries. Comparison, entertaining, and lively. As the keynote speaker, Xuewenmao tells the real historical materials in a story-telling way. Little tiger Baishan, Heishui, and Huahua are listeners. After listening to them, they will express their different feelings in order to show the current scholars' different views on different facts, thereby inspiring the audience's independent thinking consciousness and "tolerant" spirit.(translated from douban)

title: Haier Xiongdi
synopsis: The Haier brothers created by the wise old man, namely the elder brother Qindao and the younger brother Haier, travel and adventure with their little friends. From the Pacific to the Americas and Antarctica, from Australia to Africa, Europe, Asia, and finally back to the starting point. While enjoying the scenic spots along the way, you also encounter various dangers and are in different dangers. In this, you can experience the mystery and beauty of nature and understand the stories behind them. It can be said to integrate geography, humanities, history and other knowledge into one. It can be described as a masterpiece of domestic popular science animation by allowing viewers to have fun while watching.(translated from douban)

title: Haier Xiongdi Yuzhou Da Maoxian
synopsis: An asteroid flies towards the earth, and a devastating disaster is about to happen... The wise old man awakened the Haier brothers and used wisdom and technology to resolve the crisis of human existence. The Haier brothers found the footprints left by the wise old man and embarked on an interstellar journey to explore the vast unknown universe. In this space adventure story, the Haier brothers have their sister "Mengmeng", new partners "Milk" and "Soda Blue" to accompany them. They shuttle between the stars, come into contact with all kinds of intelligent creatures and alien civilizations, make friendly contacts with new friends, and fight against their opponents. Faced with many problems such as power failure, lack of fresh water, space junk, mysterious black holes, etc., they bravely accept the challenge, exert a spirit of collaboration, and use wisdom to solve problems. The Haier brothers will lead children to explore the space, witness cutting-edge technology, and experience growth and transformation. "Haier Brothers Cosmic Adventure" not only brings joy to children, but also encourages children to actively seek knowledge, respect nature and science, and not be bound by standard answers, so as to fully stimulate their imagination and spirit of exploration. At the same time, the cartoon will guide children to become honest, kind and courageous people, build a bridge of communication and interaction between parents and children, and create an unforgettable and instructive time for parents and children. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Xin Sanzijing
synopsis: A anime to teach a book called "Sanzijing".

title: Xiao Bei Liulang Ji
synopsis: Xiaobei is a cute kitten. By accident, it fell on the grassland, far away from relatives, and wandered alone. The ferocious old wolf and the evil big snake stared at the helpless Beckham, and wanted to turn it into a Chinese meal. However, although Beckham did not have a strong physique, he had a clever mind. He used it time and time again. Wisdom is with them. 　　 At the suggestion of his friend Xiaotuoduo, Beckham decided to climb the highest mountain and the highest tree on the mountain, so that he could see home and the way home. In this way, Beckham embarked on a journey home. Along the way, countless dangers and accidents await it, and countless friends help and support it. Two poachers came in the forest. The animals were in danger. In the crisis, Beckham came forward to rescue his friends.(translated from douban)

title: Yinyue Chuan
synopsis: On the vast sea, there is a beautiful small ship with a band on board. The band members are father, mother, son, daughter, and a baby elephant named Mozart. Dad's round belly can make a drum sound when it beats, and two black beards can command the army; Mom can play with tableware, and of course, she can still make good food. The daughter’s hair can be used as a harp, her singing can make the boat tremble; the son’s mouth can be turned into a trumpet, his shortcoming is that he is not hygienic; the most fun is Mozart, his nose and ears are very beautiful Musical instruments, even the tail can be used to tune the instrument. 　　 This happy band is traveling on the sea. They have encountered many fun, thrilling, and weird things. What will happen to them in the end? (translated from douban)

title: Journey to the West
synopsis: The 52 episodes of large-scale domestic cartoons in the headquarters are adapted from the classic "Journey to the West". Tang Seng led his apprentices Sun Wukong, Zhu Bajie, Sha Monk and Bai Longma, and a group of five people learned from the West. Encountered with ninety-nine and eighty-one difficulties, he finally achieved true results. The animated cartoon has added many contemporary elements to the familiar prototype, which is more characteristic of the times than previous versions. It not only retains the essence of classical masterpieces, but also creates a well-known animated version of the master and apprentice image. (translated from douban)

title: Yueliang Jie
synopsis: There is a mysterious invitation in the legend 　　 invite people to visit 　　 Moon Street 　　 first look for Aunt Sesame 　　 still find Grandpa Crystal 　　 There is a mysterious invitation in the legend 　　 invite people to visit 　　 Moon Street 　　 first look for Aunt Sesame 　　 still find Grandpa Crystal 　　 As long as justice and brave support the mountains 　　 Use that wisdom to lay down the steps 　　 you will see a beautiful castle 　　That is Moon Street 　　 Moon Street and Moon Street 　　The kind world (translated from douban)

title: De Du Xiao Heshang
synopsis: There are two monks, one old and one young, in a small temple. They live and practice here. And be self-sufficient, and live a good life. The spirit is also quite fulfilling. However, due to differences in personality, age, experience, etc., the old and the young often have different understandings of the same thing. Therefore, once awkward, there is no doubt that a joke will come out. The old one follows the rules; the little one is curious and eager to try. The difference between them is because they are extremely sincere and persistent.(translated from douban)

title: Dragon School
synopsis: There is a primary school student in the Dinosaur School named Abian, who is lively, cute and strong. In his mind, Dinosaur Island is the most beautiful place in the world. 　　 On the beautiful Dinosaur Island, Abian has four good friends. They study and play together and face the troubles of growth together.(translated from douban)

title: Sanshiliu Ji Qiyu Ji
synopsis: The background of the story is arranged in a beautiful world composed of insects (ants). The protagonist in the film is a smart, studious and innovative teenager. Because of his love of thirty-six strategies, he is called "Zhuge Xiaoliang" by friends, but In a scientific experiment, he and his friends suddenly became very, very small people, even as big as ants. The world suddenly became different from before. So the witty "Zhuge Xiaoliang" began to be unprecedented. Adventure. 　　Since it is an adventure, there are many unexpected things happening. "Thirty-Six Strategies" is our little protagonist's most powerful weapon. (translated from douban)

title: Maomi Xiao Bei
synopsis: The movie version of "Xiao Bei Liulang Ji".

title: Kanojo mo Kanojo
synopsis: After harboring an unrequited love for years, Naoya Mukai finally gets to date his childhood friend, Saki Saki. However, just as he tries to commit himself to this relationship, he receives an abrupt confession from Nagisa Minase. At first, Naoya tries to reject her but is soon overcome by feelings of not wanting to hurt Nagisa. Trying to avoid betraying his girlfriend's trust in him, Naoya thinks up a "solution" to make both girls happy—two-timing. Naturally, Saki rebuffs this idea, but through Naoya's and Nagisa's persistence, she reluctantly submits. With this, a three-way affair begins between Naoya, his girlfriend, and his "other" girlfriend, as they develop a relationship that deviates from the social norm.

title: Xiaobing Zhangga
synopsis: 1943 was a critical moment of the War of Resistance Against Japan. The fighting in North China and East China was extremely fierce. The story was concentrated in Baiyangdian. Zhang Ga, a young enthusiastic teenager who yearned for revolutionary heroes, went to find guerrillas with hatred and yearning for a fighting career, and finally met Luo by chance. Jin Bao, as he wished, joined the Yan Ling team and became the little scout he dreamed of. 　　 Gazi, who had recovered his wounds, secretly walked up to find the team. In Dongshan Village, Sakuragi led a large number of troops to take hostages in order to ensure the safety of arms. After protecting Gazi, Fatun's father was also taken away by the Japanese army. A strong sense of mission made Gazi follow the Japanese army that went away, because he wanted to fulfill his promise to Fat Dun. At the same time, the important armaments of the Japanese army have arrived, and Sakuragi, who is in charge of defense here, dare not relax. 　　 Gazi detected that the Japanese army had taken the people of Dongshan Village and Lao Zhong on the train as hostages, and had the idea of ​​saving people. Gazi took advantage of the chaos and got on the train. 　　 The Yan Ling team, which had been preparing to blow up the train, planted a bomb on the bridge where the train passed. When everyone learned that the hostage was in the car, they became at a loss...(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 2005.This anime won The 11th China Film Huabiao Awards ---Excellent Animation Award.

title: The Warrior
synopsis: According to legend, when Nuwa used colorful stones to mend the sky, the fragments fell into the world and were obtained by the Yellow Emperor. The stone possesses extraordinary powers to help the Yellow Emperor defeat the evil Chi You and seal his soul. In order to prevent people with bad intentions from getting this stone in the future, the Yellow Emperor sealed it in a secret place, and made four treasures and gave it to four people, ordering them to guard the stone for generations. These four people and their descendants are called "guardians." 　　 One of the guardians is Feihong's master. The two masters and apprentices had lived a life incontrovertible in the mountains, until one night the ingot and the killer suddenly attacked. The master handed a fan to Feihong, and then disappeared in the ingot fire. After Feihong struggled to get rid of the killer's pursuit, he found another guardian-a talking panda and his treasure-a big bamboo shoot in the direction indicated by the folding fan. Feihong learned from the panda's mouth that the folding fan is the master's treasure. As they went out to find another guardian, the ingot's killer chased him. The panda was captured and the bamboo shoots fell into Yuan Bao's hands. 　　 Feihong chases to a big city, meets Ah Rong, and rescues the panda. Yuan Bao followed the instructions of the bamboo shoot to reach the guardian Qian'er's ice world one step earlier than Feihong, and deceived her trust. When the three of Feihong arrived, Qianer couldn't help but fought fiercely with them. When she woke up, Yuan Bao had stolen her treasure and caused an avalanche. In the chaos, the folding fan also fell into Yuan Bao's hands. Desperate Feihong found the Yellow Emperor's temple in the ice cave. According to the murals in the hall, there are five treasures. This secret rekindled their hope. 　　 The ingot was robbed by the foreigner Baodun, and he started the castle to fight against the gunboat of Baodun. When Feihong and others arrived, the castle had fallen beside the gunboat of Bolton. Baodun gathered the four treasures but still couldn't get the stone. He was very angry and shot Qian'er and others. When Feihong was shot, the fifth mysterious treasure appeared. The alien space where the stone was stored was opened. Chiyou's evil soul in Shinei will be released, and the world is facing chaos... (translated from douban)

title: Fengyun Jue
synopsis: Bu Jingyun (voiced by Nicholas Tse) and Nie Feng (voiced by Ren Xianqi), in order to avenge their father's vengeance, they joined forces to kill the fire unicorn, swallow the blood of the unicorn, and at the expense of the demon, they would join forces to eradicate their father, the enemy and the hero. But Nie Feng couldn't control the demonic nature in his body, and he missed the cloud and knocked the cloud off the cliff... 　　 Worship Sword Villa was the world’s number one sword-making villa, but was framed by the imperial court and killed. Shao Zhuangzhu Aojue (Tong Zirong dubbing) escaped from the dead and lived alone in the Western Regions, looking for revenge. When the decision learned that Feng and Yun were carrying Qilin blood, they could open the seal for their ancestors, so they began to look for them... 　　 At that time, Feng and Yun each had a loved one, and lived a life away from the rivers and lakes. However, the arrival of the decision is destined to set off a bloody storm...(translated from douban)

title: Kui Ba
synopsis: The "Quiba" TV cartoon is based on the first "Quiba's One Hundred Thousand Urgency" in the series of animated films. It is a re-edited TV version of ten episodes, each with 11 minutes. The TV version completely retains the movie’s world view, character settings, story content and plot line, but remakes the opening and ending songs.(translated from douban)

title: Cangao Duoji
synopsis: Young Tian Jin’s parents made countless sacrifices in their early years to bring Western medicine to Tibet. Because they could not adapt to life on the plateau, Tian Jin’s mother returned to the mainland with her infant son, while his father Ragba continued on the plateau. His career. A few years later, his mother died of illness and helpless Tian Jin came to the plateau to look for his father, but there were countless resentments in his heart. Ragba is busy practicing medicine all day long, letting his son learn to shepherd by himself. One day, Tian Jin was threatened by a bear. Fortunately, a golden Tibetan mastiff helped him. Later, due to various opportunities, he and this Tibetan mastiff named Duoji became the closest friends. At the same time, demons specializing in killing creatures appeared on the grassland, and the peaceful life of herders was completely broken...(translated from douban)

title: Sai Er Hao Zhi Xunzhao Fenghuang Shenshou
synopsis: On an ancient and mysterious map, there is a record of extraordinary elves that no one has ever seen in the legend. The appearance of this map set off a bloody storm in the universe. The ordinary mechanic Xiaomo (voiced by Yang Ou) was involved in a conspiracy planned by the cosmic pirate Meritu (voiced by Yang Menglu) in the accident and was captured by his opponent, and the Purcell fell into In an unprecedented critical situation. The cowardly and cowardly announcer Qiao Sen (voiced by Yang Haiyin) and the boastful chef Lao Wang (voiced by Liu Qin), Xiaomo must form an alliance with these seemingly unreliable companions to fight against the powerful and evil Galaxy Murray The Tu Legion, their existence, became the last layer of defense of the Purcell. In the end, can ordinary little people rely on their wisdom and courage to defeat evil and spread justice?(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 賽爾號之尋找鳳凰神獸

title: Qijiguang Yingxiong Chuan
synopsis: The historical cartoon "The Legend of Qi Jiguang" produced by Zhejiang Hemudu Animation and Culture Development Co., Ltd. was approved by the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television yesterday. It tells the story of Qi Jiguang, a patriotic general in the Ming Dynasty against the Japanese. The film focuses on Qi Jiguang’s battlefield career when Ning Shao was a member of Ning Shao. It shows Qi Jiguang’s history of fighting foreign enemies, fighting bravely and defending the country when he was stationed in Linshanwei, and discovering the rich history and humanities of Linshanwei, Yuyao, Zhejiang. Resources to promote the great patriotism spirit.(translated from douban)

title: Happy Heroes
synopsis: The story takes place on a very technologically advanced planet. Dr. Zhai (voiced by Deng Yuting) is an outstanding mechanic. By accident, he activated five supermen scattered all over the planet. After that, these supermen became Messengers of justice to protect the peace of the planet. 　　 Lively, cheerful, straightforward, happy Superman (Voice by Liu Hongyun), smart and bold, gentle and reliable Sweetheart Superman (Deng Yuting Dubbing), natural beauty, powerful Huaxin Superman (voiced by Yan Yanzi), confused, careless Superman (voiced by Zu Qing) and taciturn, warm outside and careful Superman (voiced by Liu Hongyun), five unique little ones What the little Superman has to face is the big monster from the discouraged planet (Gao Quansheng dubbing). In the face of such a powerful enemy and a lot of trouble caused by the enemy, are these five little guys really fine? (translated from douban)

title: Sai Er Hao Da Dianying 3: Zhanshen Lianmeng
synopsis: The spiral galaxy in the universe has a beautiful planet-the planet Nass. There is a kind of magical fruit on the planet, which has always protected the ecological balance of the entire Nass star. The Agia tribe on the planet has guarded the tree of gods for generations, but suddenly many space pirates sneaked into the star Nath. It happened that the members of the Pioneer Squad on the Purcell, Sai Xiaoshi, Atieda, and Kalulu passed by here. , They immediately joined the battle... As the battle escalated, four magic elves: Rey the Electric King, Black the Shadow King, Gaia the Warrior Warrior, Cassius the Jedi also joined...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 賽爾號大電影3：戰神聯盟

title: Kaixin Chaoren 2: Qi Yuan Xingzhi Zhan
synopsis: A grand Superman game is going on in the star ball, where various Supermen gather here, showing a joyful ocean everywhere. Happy Superman (voiced by Liu Hongyun), Sweetheart Superman (voiced by Deng Yuting), Huaxin Superman (voiced by Yan Yanzi) and a group of people also came here to plunge into this happy ocean, such a lively place, naturally, there is no need for mischief The troublesome big monster (voiced by Gao Quansheng) and the little monster (voiced by Yan Yanzi). What everyone did not expect was that an accident caused everyone except Happy Superman, Big Guai, and Zhang Lang (voiced by Zu Liqing) to disappear. In order to find unaccounted friends, everyone embarked on an adventurous journey. Waiting for them on the road ahead, apart from the ensuing difficulties and troubles, there is also a group of quirky mini Supermen. (translated from douban)

title: Xiyou Ji Zhi Da Sheng Guilai
synopsis: Five hundred years ago, Monkey King Monkey King (voiced by Zhang Lei), who was transformed from a stone monkey, made a big fuss in the Heavenly Palace, and was eventually brought to the foot of the Five Elements Mountain by the Buddha. In the past years, the city of Chang'an was suddenly ransacked by the mountain demon. The young boys and girls cried again and again, and their lives were hanging by a thread. At a time of crisis, Jiang Liuer (voiced by Lin Zijie), who was raised by the walking monk Faming (voiced by Wu Wenlun), rescued a little girl and was chased by the mountain demon. After some chasing, Jiang Liu'er unintentionally lifted Monkey King's seal, and the Monkey King naturally taught the mountain demon well. Because the seal was not unlocked, Wukong had to escort Jiang Liuer and the little girl back to Chang'an, and encountered Zhu Bajie (voiced by Liu Jiurong) and Bai Longma along the way. 　　 At the same time, the Demon King (Tong Zirong dubbing) is never reconciled to failure. He hides in the dark, waiting for the opportunity to give Monkey King a fatal blow...(translated from douban)

title: Da Hufa
synopsis: In order to find the unaccounted prince (voiced by Tuthammon), the guardian (voiced by the small serial kills) came to a weird and weird town, where a group of speechless peanuts lived, and they lit up every night An oil lamp of unknown origin blackened the giant peanuts floating in the sky. The guardian found the prince hiding here in the town, and met Xiaoming, who had been protecting the prince (voiced by You Wu Yueshan), and the talking peanut man Xiao Jiang (voiced by Li Lanling), and he was lured by the force of the guardian Next, the prince agreed to go back with him to inherit the throne, but was kidnapped on the way. In the process of rescuing the prince, the great guardian gradually solved the terrifying mystery hidden in this small town. At the same time, his powerful enemy was pressing hard behind him, trying to put him to death and then hurry.(translated from douban)

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yang Yang Yundonghui
synopsis: On sunny days, Gentle Prairie ushered in an unusual happy festival-the Sheep and Sheep Games held every 40 years. In order to successfully host the sports meeting, Yangcun’s partners worked together to make preparations. Even the raging tornado was locked up, and the elderly village chief spared no effort to become a torchbearer. Soon, the sheep compatriots from all over the world came to the Qingqing Prairie. There were argali, mechanical sheep, black goats, goats, sheep, Tibetan antelopes, etc. They formed different teams to compete. There was only one goal, and that was to pass Selected at various levels to become the respected patriarch of the sheep clan. In the days that followed, the sheep and sheep started a series of intense and interesting sports competitions. 　　 On the other hand, the Big Big Wolf couple found that this was a god-given opportunity to catch sheep, so they also mixed in and waited for the opportunity to act...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之羊羊運動會

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yang Yang Kuaile De Yi Nian
synopsis: Lazy sheep accidentally discovered that several dreams had come true, and regarded them as a kind of revelation, and everything proceeded as shown in the dream. But in reality, it was not as good as his dream. He thought it was dangerous but he was safe. But when he thought he was safe, he fell into wolf claws. Although he was rescued by Pleasant Goat and them, he still thought he was in a dream.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之羊羊快樂的一年

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Qi Si Miao Xiang Xiyangyang
synopsis: In the new year, the story of Qingqing Prairie Goat and Big Big Wolf (voiced by Zhang Lin) will also continue. And this time the story is even more exciting. These cute little guys go to the sky, go on various big adventures, and cause a lot of troubles. For example, the village chief (voiced by Gao Quansheng) and Red Wolf (voiced by Zhao Na) accidentally become fish, forcing the sheep and sheep to dive into the deep sea to seek rescue; or the animals on the green grassland run by mistake. Traveling in the weird world has caused the two unreliable guys, Xiao Shao and Hei Dashuai, to become active again, causing a lot of jokes. During this period, Big Big Wolf’s son Xiao Hui Hui (voiced by Liang Ying) gradually grew up, Big Big Wolf determined to train him to become a famous sheep catcher, and the friendship between Xiao Hui Hui and Lazy Yang Yang (voiced by Liang Ying) It deepens day by day, which also leads to countless interesting stories.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之奇思妙想喜羊羊

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Gei Kuaile Jiayou
synopsis: With the arrival of the new year, more fun emerges on the green grassland. First, a wonderful change occurred in Lazy Sheep, and an accident gave him a magical superpower, which caused countless fun and interesting things, and also caused countless hardships and misery to Big Big Wolf. And Big Big Wolf’s baby son, Little Gray Gray Growing up day by day, in order for Huihui to successfully complete the wolf ceremony, he came up with many tricks to help his son catch the sheep. And Xiao Hui Hui not only successfully entered Yangcun to go to school, but also made Big Big Wolf and the little sheep reach a settlement. During this period, Xiang Tai Lang's daughter Xiang Xiang also made a grand appearance, Xiao Hui Hui finally faced various choices on the way to the wolf's life. 　　Wonderful and funny stories are constantly being staged, and various magical props are emerging in an endless stream. The new dramas of Lazy Sheep and Xiao Huihui come easily...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之給快樂加油

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Jingji Da Lianmeng
synopsis: The master-gathering and splendid Sheep and Goat Games has left unforgettable memories for all the craps. Of course, for those sheep masters who unfortunately lost, of course there are many injustices buried in their hearts. They are gearing up and ready to go, but the Goat Games will take place only once in 40 years, and the next one is nowhere in sight. To this end, the sheep race compatriots discussed holding a new sports meeting called the "sports league", coupled with the support of the extremely boring patriarch, and the big gray wolf playing tricks from it, the special and interesting sports league was successfully held. The antelopes, Tibetan antelopes, the Western Region Sword Sheep, and Mechanical Sheep have gathered in the green grassland. The Big Big Wolf also sharpens its sword and plans to take advantage of the chaos. 　　The long-lost sports meet is grandly held. The sheep and sheep will have an unforgettable summer...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之競技大聯盟

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Kaixin Riji
synopsis: In the new year, the happy story of wolf and sheep on the green grassland continues. This time, Pleasant Goat (voiced by Zu Liqing), Beautiful Goat (voiced by Deng Yuting), Lazy Goat (voiced by Liang Ying), Boiling Goat (voiced by Liu Hongyun), Nuan Yangyang (voiced by Deng Yuting), and rival Big Big Wolf (voiced by Zhang Lin) ) And Red Wolf (voiced by Zhao Na) are all presented in the form of a diary. For example, the lazy sheep and the sheep are desperate to eat because they are afraid of insects biting themselves, the warm sheep and the sheep use the beards of the wolf ancestors to accidentally freeze their companions, and the gray wolf pretends to be the cousin of the village chief and mixes into the sheep village but ran out of the village, cooking is super unpalatable. Red Wolf is determined to seek advice from the culinary master Mei Yang Yang. 　　 Familiar characters, familiar scenes, brand new stories. Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf accompany the children into the new year...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之開心日記

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Kaixin Fangchengshi
synopsis: The Alien King came to Qingqing Grassland as a guest, and stayed at the house of Big Big Wolf (voiced by Zhang Lin) for three months, making Red Wolf agitated. After Big Big Wolf's persuasion, the alien king decided to go back to his own planet and gave Big Big Wolf a bucket of hard eggs like a rock before leaving. The Big Big Wolf consciously was deceived and threw the egg out angrily, but it happened to fall beside the Pleasant Goat (voiced by Zu Liqing) who was playing in the jungle. Everyone looked for the owner separately, but found nothing. Later, Xiao Huihui (voiced by Liang Ying) accidentally took apart the egg, and from the inside came out an extremely cool racing "little handsome guy". After that, formula cars with unique functions such as the big guy, the princess, the forerunner, the red general, the vanguard, the legend of the wolf, the elegant throne, and the sweet sweets were born one after another. 　　 In the new year, the war between the old wolf and the lamb has been escalated in an all-round way, so wonderful that it was named by CCTV...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之開心方程式

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Lan Yang Yang Dang Da Chu
synopsis: In the new year, a new and fun story will be staged on Qingqing Grassland. This time the protagonist is the "good and lazy" lazy sheep (voiced by Liang Ying). He will make a delicious meal with his good friends and new partners, and the children Have a happy and delicious time. 　　 Yangcun built a new kitchen, and the village head (voiced by Gao Quansheng) made a lot of delicious gingerbread to share with the sheep. Lazy sheep ate gingerbread at night and accidentally knocked over the seasoning box, who would have caused violent turbulence in the kingdom of taste under the stove. From the kingdom to school, the five treasures, healthy, healthy, Huanhuan and Lele are looking for the aunt who runs away (voiced by Yan Yanzi), because the aunt controls all the tastes of the kingdom. The trouble is that grandma lives in the house of Big Big Wolf (Zhang Lin) and does not plan to go back. In desperation, Lazy Yangyang can only conceive a variety of food with her partners, hoping that grandma can return to her country with satisfaction...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之懶羊羊當大廚

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yang Yang Xiao Xinyuan
synopsis: In the new year, interesting and lovely stories continue to be staged. On a starry night, Pleasant Goat, Beautiful Goat, Warm Goat, Boiling Goat, and Lazy Goat were chatting in the suburbs. Mei Yang Yang mentioned that she heard that she would make a wish right away when she saw a shooting star, and the wish would come true. Everyone was chatting, and on the other side of the grass, Big Gray Wolf was waiting for the chance to catch the lambs. In fact, Meteor can really help everyone realize their wishes, but Grandpa Meteor, who is about to retire, is not willing to take extra wishes anymore. He just wants to go home and rest soon. However, contrary to expectations, Grandpa Meteor was shot down while avoiding Meteor shells. In desperation, grandpa can only help everyone realize all kinds of nonsensical wishes, but he is tired enough, and the day of departure is far away. 　　In order to help everyone, Pleasant Goat took the baton of Grandpa Meteor and embarked on a journey full of joy, and Big Big Wolf will never give up this great opportunity...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之羊羊小心愿

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yi Chu Da Maoxian
synopsis: In the new year, Big Big Wolf is not dead, still running on the journey of catching sheep. After the setback, Big Gray Wolf got inspiration from Xiao Huihui and developed the "Closet Internet" to try to enter the Lamb's wardrobe from his own wardrobe. His research was successful, but he bumped into a strange little wardrobe in a different space, and the little wardrobe was the courier who delivered all kinds of clothes. It is said that as long as you take good care of your clothes and make a wish sincerely, you will get new clothes from the small closet. In order to help the injured little wardrobe return to the Internet, Pleasant Goat, Beautiful Goat, Warm Goat, Boiling Goat, and Lazy Goat all started to help him. In the process, they also met a new friend in the little wardrobe: Soft Ruler "pipi", washboard "turn around", knitting needle "pointy", colorful thread roll "little rainbow", toucan scissors "big mouth", magnifying glass "big mirror". 　　 When Big Gray Wolf and Red Wolf learned of the news, the battle for the small wardrobe began one after another...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之衣櫥大冒險

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Mama Le Fengkuang
synopsis: In order to catch the lambs, Big Big Wolf really does everything. This time he invented the gourmet gene gun, easily broke through the strong defense line of Yangcun, and achieved an overwhelming victory. Unexpectedly, the chaotic chase that followed turned the entire green grassland into a candy grassland, and to make matters worse, the Red Wolf seemed to crash his head after the accident. She regards Lazy Sheep as her son, and Grey Wolf as an enemy, and can't even recognize her own little Grey Grey. Pleasant Goat and the others thought this was Red Wolf’s trick at first, but eventually found that Red Wolf had really "turned an enemy into a friend". Lazy sheep and sheep have produced more wolf mothers out of thin air, and interesting and touching stories are staged one after another. Can Xiao Huihui regain her gentle and harsh mother? 　　 At the same time, Qingqing Grassland is about to usher in a terrible disaster... (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之媽媽樂瘋狂

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yuanshi Shijie Lixian Ji
synopsis: In the big movie of the Year of the Goat, Pleasant Goat and his friends went to the primitive world to experience a legendary adventure with the ancient goats. Although I returned to my own world in the end, my friends often missed their friends from ancient times, so they used the vacation to travel through time and space to play in the past world. The head of Manyangyang Village does not want to show the superiority of modern technology products all the time, but he eventually encounters setbacks in front of the wise ancient patriarch. At the same time, the cunning Gray Wolf also returned to the ancient times through the time machine. He tried to use his invention to command the ancient stupid wolves, and successfully caught the ancient sheep with backward technology. Unexpectedly, the war on Qingqing Prairie moved to ancient times, and the collision of the latest technology and primitive weapons also made many interesting jokes. 　　Do you miss those new friends in the big movie? Come and join this thrilling ancient journey!(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之原始世界歷險記

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Xiha Chuangshijie
synopsis: "Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf: Hip Hop into the World" is the 14th work in the "Pleasant Big Big Wolf" series, produced by Guangdong Original Power Culture Communication Co., Ltd., directed by the original power director group, and written by the original power creation group. 　　 The film tells the fantasy story of Pleasant Goat and his friends driving a small hip-hop train to the top of a tree.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之嘻哈闖世界

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yang Yang Xiao Zhentan
synopsis: "Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf" is the 15th work in the "Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf" series. The play was broadcast on CCTV Children’s Channel on July 9, 2016. "Little Sheep Detective" rarely uses suspense reasoning as the theme, letting the wolf and goat become a detective in the play to continue fighting wits and courage. The play’s creative team mentioned: “This is a brand new attempt in the Pleasant Goat series. It brings practical knowledge of life through intense and exciting cases, allowing the audience to think in the process of solving the case and gain joy from the progress of the plot.” The series is a series of reasoning, puzzle solving, and suspense. Wonderful scientific knowledge, magical natural phenomena, and rich common sense of life emerge in endlessly, and suspense and hilarious are bombarded by turns.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之羊羊小偵探

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Shenhai Lixian Ji
synopsis: In the submarine metropolis world, there is a "sea star" that can absorb marine pollution. During a competition between sheep and wolf, the "Star of the Sea" split into many pieces and scattered in the sea. In order to collect more debris and control the "Star of the Sea", the lambs and Big Big Wolf battled wits and staged a debris collection competition on the seabed. (TRANSLATED FROM DOUBAN)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之深海歷險記

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Faming Da Zuozhan
synopsis: Big Big Wolf tried his best to create various inventions to catch sheep, but failed repeatedly. So Big Gray Wolf came to the invention planet to grab the cosmic inventor—Miao Duoduo's invention chariot Jubao to catch sheep. After Slow Yang Yang learned about it, he planned to build another Jubao to deal with Big Big Wolf. But because Slow Goat was an ordinary inventor, he not only failed, but also lost his ability to invent. Thus, the lambs also came to the planet of invention. 　　 As soon as they set foot on the planet of invention, the lambs were attracted by the incredible people and things on the planet: inventing the planet Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, the residents have their own unique invention ability and are masters of invention in a certain field. 　　 The lambs found Miao Duoduo through the news, but Jubao has been snatched by Big Big Wolf. Miao Duoduo gave the lambs another of his invention chariots, the Miao Bao, to fight against the Big Big Wolf Jubao. Since Jubao and Miaobao did not invent the planet's energy source-the core of energy, they could not exert their maximum power. Big Gray Wolf tried various methods and created various inventions to snatch the core of energy. The sheep and sheep used the Miaobao to stop the Big Big Wolf. Miao Duo Duo also told the lambs that as long as the Miao Bao uses inventions to help others, accumulate energy, and coupled with the core of energy, the slow sheep can restore the ability of invention. As a result, the lambs began to play their whimsical ideas, using inventions to solve the fancy help of the residents.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之發明大作戰

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Qihuan Tiankong Dao
synopsis: "Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf: Fantasy Sky Island" is the 18th work in the "Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf" series. It is the third work of the Pleasant Goat Adventure series "Hip Hop into the World".(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之奇幻天空島

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yang Cun Shouhu Zhe
synopsis: Used to the "routine" of "wolf catching sheep", have you ever imagined the warm picture of wolf and sheep living in peace? According to Cai Ruiqiong, deputy general manager of Original Dynamics, introduced at the press conference, "Guardians of Yangcun", which will meet the audience during the winter vacation in 2019, may realize this wish. This new work will pay more attention to the depiction of emotions, brotherhood, friendship, father-son love, family love, through high-quality plot and content, will make a wider age group of people have emotional resonance. 　　 On the screen, the props and abilities of the wolf sheep will be more prominent this time, the screen is more expressive, and the creative invention will be inspiring. At the same time, there will be new roles between the sheep and wolf clans. As for the plot, what is the fate of Yangcun facing the evolved wolf tribe? Who turned the gray wolf into a cute pet dog? I heard that Yangcun will also stage "Infernal Affairs", who is the undercover? In the winter vacation of 2019, these mysteries need to be revealed one by one!(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之羊村守護者

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Kua Shikong Jiubing
synopsis: The lambs are involved in a world-shattering conspiracy to destroy the world, traveling through the chaotic timeline, saving the disrupted time and space. In this adventure, they traveled through history, returned to the past, and helped old friends who were affected. In the process, they discovered some truths hidden behind the scenes. In the crisis of annihilation, Xiao How should the sheep protect their friends?(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之跨時空救兵
